org.apache.giraph.io.formats

类 TextVertexInputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.conf.DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      • org.apache.giraph.io.VertexInputFormat<I,V,E>
        • org.apache.giraph.io.formats.TextVertexInputFormat<I,V,E>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index value
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>, GiraphInputFormat
    直接已知子类:
    AdjacencyListTextVertexInputFormat, IntIntNullTextInputFormat, IntNullNullTextInputFormat, JsonBase64VertexInputFormat, JsonLongDoubleFloatDoubleVertexInputFormat

    public abstract class TextVertexInputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends VertexInputFormat<I,V,E>
    Abstract class that users should subclass to use their own text based vertex input format.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      protected class  TextVertexInputFormat.TextVertexReader
      Abstract class to be implemented by the user based on their specific vertex input.
      protected class  TextVertexInputFormat.TextVertexReaderFromEachLine
      Abstract class to be implemented by the user to read a vertex from each text line.
      protected class  TextVertexInputFormat.TextVertexReaderFromEachLineProcessed<T>
      Abstract class to be implemented by the user to read a vertex from each text line after preprocessing it.
      protected class  TextVertexInputFormat.TextVertexReaderFromEachLineProcessedHandlingExceptions<T,X extends Throwable>
      Abstract class to be implemented by the user to read a vertex from each text line after preprocessing it with exception handling.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected GiraphTextInputFormat textInputFormat
      Uses the GiraphTextInputFormat to do everything
